channel.title: Projects on Who am I?
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Who am I?

item.title: Ludum Dare 55
item.description: During the latter half of my second semester in college, I joined and participated in the world’s largest and longest-running “Game-Jam” - Ludum Dare. In this online competition, thousands of enthusiastic developers rush to complete a game within a limited time bracket of up to 48 hours (Compo) and 72 hours (Jam). I participated in the Compo for a shortened period over the weekend, but never the less landed 277th place overall of 1582 ranked entries

item.title: Matrix Command Effect
item.description: I created a program that visualized a version of the falling characters effect from the Matrix Movies for a background effect and to generate CMD command outputs. Program Release Available on Github https://github.com/erikhugofrenes/Matrix-Command-Effect Video Demonstration and Tutorial https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yhf1i6HHOAg
